name: The Great Quest of Star Sprinkler
name_original: The Great Quest of Star Sprinkler
description: The four shields defending the planet Earth from alien invasions have been stolen by forces of evil! It's up to Star Sprinkler, the superheroine, to recollect them from the evil forces and save the world! A classic-style horizontal 2D shooter! #arcade #retro #scifi #shooter #2dshooter
